text: These ones are fashioned in multicam, a commercial camouflage similar to the OCP used by the U.S. Armed Forces.
These ones are decorated with the black multicam pattern, for that stealth feeling.
These ones are decorated with the desert multicam pattern, for when you suddenly find yourself in Nevada.
These ones are decorated with the tropic multicam pattern, perfect for that steamy, sweaty jungle warfare.
These ones are decorated with the white multicam pattern, for when your target is the at top of Everest.
These ones are covered in the woodland camouflage pattern.
These ones are decorated with the OCP pattern, the camouflage employed by multiple branches of the U.S. Armed Force.
These ones are decorated with the pixelated UCP pattern, the camouflage previously used by multiple branches of the U.S. Armed Force.
These ones are decorated with the PenCott WildWood camouflage, a pixelated and dithered woods pattern with shades of green and brown.
